bug.author: h-acks
bug.summary: Two bounding box predictions for one item
bug.description: I've noticed that one object will have two bounding with similar items like a laptop and TV.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/h-acks>@h-acks</denchmark-link> yes this is multi-label classification. You can disable this in the NMS function in utils.py.
